message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we believe it would be valuable to you. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $2000000.
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value it might hold, but given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price closer to my maximum willingness to pay. How about $1800000?
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your situation and are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is $1900000.
I'm glad to see we're making progress. Considering the value of the product and my financial situation, I would like to propose a price of $1750000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to compromise. Our counteroffer for the product is $1850000.
Considering the ongoing negotiations and my budgetary constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $1780000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. We value your interest in our product. Our counteroffer for the product is $1825000.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, but I must stick to my budget. My final offer for the product is $1775000.
Thank you for your final offer, Bob. We understand your position and respect your budget constraints. Our counteroffer for the product is $1800000.
After careful consideration, I believe the product is worth a bit less than what Alice has been asking. My final offer for the product is $1750000.
